content.rendered:
Directed By Ayan Mukerji

Written By Hussain Dalal. Ayan Mukerji

Stars Ranbir Kapoor (Shiva). Alia Bhatt (Isha). Amitabh Bachchan (Guru). Nagarjuna Akkineni (Anish). Mouni Roy (Junoon). Shah Rukh Khan (Scientist Mohan Bhargav). Deepika Padukone (Amrita). Dimple Kapadia (Doctor). Rashi Mal (Shaina).

Language Hindi. Tamil. Telugu. Kannada. Malayalam

Producer Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Apoorva Mehta.

Production Dharma Productions
